title: Betrayal of Isengard (3R29)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove (1). Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.
Lore:	”'There is only one Lord of the Ring.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Version: +.
